00021 function smarty_function_eval($params, &$smarty)
00022 {
00023 
00024     if (!isset($params['var'])) {
00025         $smarty->trigger_error("eval: missing 'var' parameter");
00026         return;
00027     }
00028 
00029     if($params['var'] == '') {
00030         return;
00031     }
00032 
00033     $smarty->_compile_source('evaluated template', $params['var'], $_var_compiled);
00034 
00035     ob_start();
00036     $smarty->_eval('?>' . $_var_compiled);
00037     $_contents = ob_get_contents();
00038     ob_end_clean();
00039 
00040     if (!empty($params['assign'])) {
00041         $smarty->assign($params['assign'], $_contents);
00042     } else {
00043         return $_contents;
00044     }
00045 }
00046

00048 
00049 ?>
